mapper.update:
update quartz_task_records
taskNo = #{taskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timeKeyValue = #{timekeyvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
executeTime = #{executetime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
taskStatus = #{taskstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
failcount = #{failcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
failReason = #{failreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lastModifyTime = #{lastmodifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update quartz_task_records set taskNo = #{taskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timeKeyValue = #{timekeyvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, executeTime = #{executetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, taskStatus = #{taskstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, failcount = #{failcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, failReason = #{failreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lastModifyTime = #{lastmodifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from quartz_task_records where taskNo = #{taskNo} order by createTime desc;
